desc: Contact Reflex Analysis (CRA) uncovers the root cause of health issues with a strong focus on the heart--energetic, physical, and emotional. When the heart is energetically tired, all other organs, glands, and systems will work overtime or even sacrifice their needs in order to help the heart as it continues to beat.

layout.text: Contact Reflex Analysis® integrates your wellness tools and techniques into one system to transform your practice and the lives of your patients.
